Abraham is spot on.  Here is an example showing how to get surface temperatures out of Honeybee EnergyPlus runs:

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&amp...;](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Mutiple_constructions_and_names_for_windows&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0)
